content: pattern written for newborn and preemie sized babies using baby weight yarn light / 3 h 5 mm crochet hook for newborn size 4 5 long by 12 cir gauge 3 half_double_crochet row=1 4 half_double_crochet sts=1 g 4 mm crochet hook for preemie size 4 long by 11 cir- gauge 7 half_double_crochet row =2 10 half_double_crochet sts=2
